SEARCH

Uses of Package
ch.autumo.beetroot

Packages that use ch.autumo.beetroot
Package
Description
ch.autumo.beetroot
Main classes for the beetRoot framework, web server and servlet (when running in a web-container).
ch.autumo.beetroot.crud
CRUD event handler for create, update and delete events.
ch.autumo.beetroot.handler
All base handlers for different purposes.
ch.autumo.beetroot.handler.tasks
Task handlers for demonstration purposes.
ch.autumo.beetroot.handler.users
User handlers; covers all necessary handlers including password reset, user settings and 2FA.
ch.autumo.beetroot.mailing
Mailing component with implementations (default: jakarta, javax).
ch.autumo.beetroot.utils
beetRoot's utilities: Bean Processor ANIS colors Database helper methods GUID generator General helper methods OS helper methods Security helper methods SSL utilities Time utilities 2FA (Google Authenticator) Web tools
planted.beetroot.handler.properties
Handler an entity for properties (aka settings) generated by PLANT.
